mapper.select: select * from auto_warehouseDB.cell where type = #{type} and crid = #{crid} order by ceid LIMIT 1
select * from auto_warehouseDB.cell where ceid = #{ceid} and crid = #{crid}
select restNum from auto_warehouseDB.repository where rid = #{rid}
mapper.update: update auto_warehouseDB.cell set type = #{type} and restNum = #{restNum} and isFull = #{isFull} where crid = #{crid} and ceid = #{ceid}

update auto_warehouseDB.cell set isFull=0, type="", restNum = null where ceid=#{ceid};
